name: The Solstice Sovereigns of the North
name_original: The Solstice Sovereigns of the North
description:
To save the Winter Solstice celebration, you have to awake the Solstice Sovereign of the North before tomorrow lest the days stay short forever.

This is an interactive fiction with which you interact by typing commands. It was written with Adventuron for the Adventuron Christmas Jam.
